description:
A model and idol contracted to Densetsu Shining Corporation Ruri has many fans amongst them http://anidb.net/ch12149 [Celty], http://anidb.net/ch12154 [Shinra], http://anidb.net/ch14866 [Togusa] and a lot of Awakusu-kai members. 
She comes from a family whose bloodline is mixed with that of vampire and thus possesses super-human strength.
Ruri is actually a serial-killer by the name Hollywood.
name: Hijiribe Ruri
